title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving Fan Engagement with Data, Analytics, & AI (SPF308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过数据、分析和人工智能推动粉丝参与 (SPF308)
abstract: AWS partners with major entertainment, games, and sports organizations to transform how fans, viewers, and players experience their products. In this session, you will learn about how leading organizations such as the NFL, Formula 1, and other major sports leagues are using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and open lakehouse architectures to create engaging experiences for their viewers. AWS will share architecture patterns and insights on how your organization can utilize AWS services to create new offerings and better engage fans around the world based on their preferences.
abstract_cn: AWS 与主要娱乐、游戏和体育组织合作，改变粉丝、观众和玩家体验其产品的方式。在本次会议中，您将了解 NFL、一级方程式赛车和其他主要体育联盟等领先组织如何使用 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker 和开放湖仓架构为观众创造引人入胜的体验。AWS 将分享架构模式和见解，说明您的组织如何利用 AWS 服务根据全球粉丝的偏好创建新产品并更好地吸引他们。
